title: Canvas will shadow the outside of a filled shape.

inline_content.Text: Canvas will shadow the outside of a filled shape.

title: Canvas will shadow both inside and outside a stroked shape.

inline_content.Text: Canvas will shadow both inside and outside a stroked shape.

title: But it’s easy to create inner-shadows using compositing.

inline_content.Text: But it’s easy to create inner-shadows using compositing.

title: To create strokes with an inner-shadow, use
destination-in
c
compositing which causes existing content to remain only where existing content is overlapped by new content. Existing content that is not overlapped by new content is erased.

inline_content.Text: To create strokes with an inner-shadow, use
compositing which causes existing content to remain only where existing content is overlapped by new content. Existing content that is not overlapped by new content is erased.

title: Stroke a shape with a shadow.
b
The shadow will extend both outward and inward from the stroke. We must get rid of the outer-shadow – leaving just the desired inner-shadow.

inline_content.Text: Stroke a shape with a shadow.
The shadow will extend both outward and inward from the stroke. We must get rid of the outer-shadow – leaving just the desired inner-shadow.

title: Set compositing to
b
destination-in
b
c
which keeps the existing stroked shadow only where it is overlapped by any new drawings.

inline_content.Text: which keeps the existing stroked shadow only where it is overlapped by any new drawings.

title: Fill the shape.
b
This causes the stroke and inner-shadow to remain while the outer shadow is erased.
Well, not exactly! Since a stroke is half-inside and half-outside the filled shape, the outside half of the stroke will be erased also. The fix is to double the

so half of the double-sized stroke is still inside the filled shape.

title: To create fills with an inner-shadow, follow steps #1-3 above but further use
destination-over
c
compositing which causes new content to be drawn
under existing content

title: Fill the shape
b
with the desired color. The shape will be filled underneath the existing inner-shadow.

title: To draw a filled shape with an inner-shadow, but with no stroke, you can draw the stroke off-canvas and use
shadowOffsetX
c
to push the shadow back onto the canvas.
